definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: You will feel very confortable in Beijing's Olympic Village.
sentences.chinese: 您将在北京的奥运村生活得非常舒适。

sentences.english: The Beijing Olympic Village is near to the main Olympic venues such as the National Stadium and the National Aquatics Center.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥运村与奥运主场馆如国家体育场和水立方相邻。

sentences.english: When officials opened the Olympic Village over the weekend, visibility was sharply limited by clotted skies.
sentences.chinese: 当上周末奥运村开村时，浓云造成能见度急剧降低。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it has been used in the project of Olympic village photovoltaic lighting construction.
sentences.chinese: 其产品也曾在奥运村建设光伏照明项目中投入应用。

sentences.english: Nice to meet you. I'm Zhang Ning. Welcome to the Olympic Village.
sentences.chinese: 见到您很高兴，我是张宁，欢迎来到奥运村。

definition: Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Laoshan Velodrome, a Beijing 2008 Olympics venue
pinyin: Lao3 shan1 Zi4 xing2 che1 guan3

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Rio/abbr. for 里約熱內盧|里约热内卢[Li3 yue1 re4 nei4 lu2]
agreement between the residents of a 里[li3], an administrative district under a city or town (Tw)
Pingchang county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan
Water Cube, nickname of Beijing National Aquatics Center 北京國家游泳中心|北京国家游泳中心, swimming venue of Beijing 2008 Olympic Games
Sochi (city on the Black Sea in Russia)
